meanings.definition: Indian soldiers serving under British or other European orders.
meanings.sent1: The sepoys marched in formation during the parade.
meanings.sent2: The sepoys were loyal soldiers in the British army.
meanings.sent3: The sepoys joked around during their break time.
meanings.sent4: The sepoys stood like statues, unwavering in their duty.
meanings.sent5: The colorful uniforms of the sepoys brightened the battlefield.

meanings.definition: A native soldier in the service of a European power in India.
meanings.sent1: Many sepoys were recruited from local villages.
meanings.sent2: The sepoys were skilled fighters in the service of the British.
meanings.sent3: The sepoys shared stories of their homeland with the officers.
meanings.sent4: The sepoys' courage was as strong as the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The sepoys' drums echoed through the valley, signaling their approach.
